title: Just a short distance from UC Berkeley on beautiful College Ave
posting_body: ['Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.', 'If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at', 'show contact info', '.', 'Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.', 'The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.', '2514 College Ave , Berkeley , CA 94704, F', ', $3,095.00', 'Just a short distance from UC Berkeley on beautiful College Ave', 'For an Appointment to View, please contact:', 'Beth mobile:', 'show contact info', 'Key Features:', 'Unit Type:', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '15', 'Rent:', '$3,095.00/month', 'Deposit:', '$1000.00', 'Parking:', '$100.00 - Gated Garage', 'Pets:', 'No Pets', 'Utilities:', 'Water and Garbage Included', 'Kitchen:', 'Laundry:', 'Coin-operated Laundry', 'Total Units:', '12', 'Lease Term:', 'One Year', 'Unit Description:', 'Sunny 2 Bed, 1.5 bath, just a short distance from UC Berkeley on beautiful College Ave.', '\xa0 Approximately 800 sq ft', 'Controlled access entry', 'Gated garage off-street parking', 'LVT flooring & condo quality carpet', 'Shared yard', '**photos of a similar unit of the same size**', 'Location Description:', 'Just a short distance from UC Berkeley on beautiful College Ave', 'Contact info:', 'Beth mobile:', 'show contact info', 'Or Contact Lapham Office at', 'show contact info', 'Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm', 'For applications or to view more listings, please visit our website by copying and pasting this link into your browsers address bar   <URL>', 'BRE# 00931216 Copyright © 2022, The Lapham Company, Inc.', 'All Rights Reserved.', 'The Lapham Company, Inc. believes all material to be correct but assumes no legal responsibility for the accuracy.', 'All units subject to prior rental, change or withdrawal without notice.']
